last_episode_to_air.name: The Comeback
last_episode_to_air.overview: With Rupert Murdoch’s reputation in tatters, he mounts an incredible comeback that involves Brexit and Donald Trump, and the issue of family succession finally seems to be resolved.

name: The Rise of the Murdoch Dynasty
original_name: The Rise of the Murdoch Dynasty
overview: The incredible story of Rupert Murdoch’s influence on world events and the dramatic personal battle for power at the heart of his own family.

episodes.name: Kingmaker
episodes.overview: Rupert Murdoch must decide who he wants to be Britain’s next prime minister, whilst a battle for succession begins within his own family.

episodes.name: The Rebel Alliance
episodes.overview: An alliance forms, including Hugh Grant, that is willing to take on the Murdoch empire. A scandal threatens Rupert’s dream of passing on the family business to one of his children.

episodes.name: The Comeback
episodes.overview: With Rupert Murdoch’s reputation in tatters, he mounts an incredible comeback that involves Brexit and Donald Trump, and the issue of family succession finally seems to be resolved.
